title: Spring Semester Hours
paragraph: Welcome back! The library is open for all your research and studying needs - just remember to wear your mask!

title: Elsevier Journals Returning to U of I
paragraph: A new agreement restores access to over 2,300 academic journals!

title: Chat help is available 24/7!
paragraph: Don't know where to start on that assignment? Get research help from a librarian 24 hours a day via chat!

title: Mobile Hotspots
paragraph: Bring our free wifi anywhere! The library now has Verizon hotspots available for checking out.

title: What Does Your Library Look Like?
paragraph: Explore our new My Library stories highlighting students and little-known library services.
